useCase.name: Access and Update DMPTool Resources
useCase.description: Data Manager accessing, reviewing, and updating resources in the DMPTool.

preconditions.precondition: Data Manager has authenticated access to the DMPTool.

successEndConditions.condition: Data Manager successfully updates project with selected storage and permissions.

useCase.trigger: Data Manager initiates the process in DMPTool.

mainSequence.step: Request security requirements for data from DMPTool Interface.
Retrieve data types and sensitivity levels from the Metadata Database.
Check compliance with legal standards using the Compliance Checker.
Display security and privacy requirements to Data Manager.
Allow Data Manager to choose storage and permission options in the Storage Planner.
Select preferred storage and permissions setup in the DMPTool.
Update project with storage and permission selections in the Metadata Database.
Confirm storage and permission setup shown to the Data Manager.
